title: Speed, Accuracy, Value. Repeat.
summary: Speed, accuracy, value, and iteration are the core mission themes applied through our software consulting services to guard against software waste. Read through each section to see how we can save you money.

content.value: A bird's eye view of our value to you.

content.copy: Recent statistics show that 70% of software projects fail, with $50-150 billion attributed to software waste annually in the U.S.

Whether it's lack of transparency at the account level, poor project management, or less-than-average talent, we've identified common issues throughout our extensive experience that has led us to our mission of solving the software waste problem by optimizing the major pain points of software development.

title: 100% Power Every Hour
summary: All of our remote consultants are universally trained in every aspect of digital development and management. Integrating our multi-role experts within your team means more speed and up to 30% less cost for you.

content.value: Just 2 of our multi-role experts can do the work of 3 competing consultants.

content.copy: Universal skill-sets mitigate communication bottlenecks, ensuring zero latency between task objectives and maximum productivity per every hour worked.

We take a federated approach to consulting. All of our consultants are remote and operate autonomously within the domestic U.S. With an emphasis on exemplary written and communication skills, all consultants command mastery in their respective trade disciplines, but are also trained in each crucial role of digital development.

title: Full Service Digital Agency
summary: Stop the churn by letting us manage, and guarantee, your entire project. From conception to production, with a focus on UX, our strategy and warranty ensures that you’ll never be a statistic of software waste.

content.value: Just 2 of our multi-role experts can do the work of 3 competing consultants.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Introducing FAST™ PLM
summary: Adopted from the automotive industry, our strategy is built on a curated Agile product lifecycle framework. Paired with military-based day-to-day processes, real cost savings are met with real-time collaboration.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Velocity™ Plan Pricing
summary: No more nickel-and-diming over hours. We’re bottom-line thinkers who know what projects cost, and know what motivates staff. Why not make project planning simpler while retaining happier talented workers?

title: Point & Pay™ Sprint Pricing
summary: For a small monthly fee, senior consultants can be retained within your team and activated as needed with a surcharge on each Agile point delivered and verified. Includes up to 10 hours of consulting per month.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Wingman™ Surety Coverage
summary: Every development project we manage is insured up to 10% of the total project price to guarantee minimum risk of delivery time, budget, and quality. Valid from kick-off until 120 days after project acceptance.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.

title: Hosting, LTS, Monitoring
summary: We offer secure at-cost cloud hosting during development, as well as post-project LTS and monitoring for a nominal fee per server per month, managed by our certified industry-leading cloud consultants.

content.copy: Optimized for efficient innovation, design, development, hosting, and marketing services, we manage digital media products and web-based apps for Fortune 500 and VC-backed companies.
